I remember a few years ago when we had that big storm, a lot of trees came down. ### Neighbors B: Right, and some people ended up using the wood for firewood or other projects. It's good to see that it's not going to waste. ### Neighbors A: Definitely. It's nice to see people being resourceful and using what they have.' }
